title: Rarely available PENTHOUSE LOFT west vil, doorman, roof, laundry
posting_body: ['RARELY AVAILABLE', 'LARGE STUNNING PENTHOUSE LOFT WITH 13 FOOT CEILINGS', 'UNBELIEVABLE LIGHT', 'KING SIZED BEDROOM', 'CLOSETS TO DIE FOR', 'FUNCTIONAL WOOD BURNING FIREPLACE', 'EXCELLENT CENTRAL WEST VILLAGE LOCATION CLOSE TO MULTIPLE SUBWAY LINES AND PATH', 'LAUNDRY ON EVERY FLOOR', 'SPARKLING BRAND NEW KITCHEN WITH DISHWASHER', 'PART TIME DOORMAN', 'SHARED ROOF TERRACE WITH SKYLINE VIEWS', 'PETS WELCOME', 'TEXT 516.262.3693 FOR IMMEDIATE RESPONSE AND TO SET UP A VIEWING ASAP - WONT LAST', 'VIDEO LINKS HERE!', 'APARTMENT:', 'https://youtu.be/gSmlRiBIRpY', 'ROOF:', '<URL>', 'Hi everyone, we have a rarely available West Village PENTHOUSE LOFT.', 'Part time doorman, laundry, roof terrace, new kitchen, pet friendly, you name it.', 'Amazing Greenwich Village location right in the heart of it all.', 'Prime central West Village location just 3 blocks from West 4th Street subway station, short walk to Washington Square Park, super close to the 1 train and the PATH as well.', 'Live the dream among all the best restaurants, bars, comedy clubs and jazz clubs in Greenwich Village!', 'This is a residential NYC neighborhood with tons of supermarkets, drycleaners, hardware stores, take-out spots, 24 hr bodegas, etc.', 'Easy walking distance to Soho, East Village, Lower East Side, Union Square, Nolita, Little Italy, etc.', 'Small, friendly Greenwich village landlord requires 1 month rent and 1 month security and out of town guarantors are accepted as needed.', 'One year lease minimum.', 'We are a long-time local realtor specializing in the areas we know and love best, happy to assist our clients through these challenging times.', 'The landlord requires that we ask prospective tenants a few questions before showing the unit, text 516.262.3693 for immediate response, otherwise if you need to email please add a US contact number.', 'Thank you!', 'Cheers,', 'Pam and Nick', '516.262.3696', 'WE HAVE MULTIPLE LISTINGS FOR 1, 2, 3, 4 AND 5 BEDROOMS THROUGHOUT THE EAST AND WEST VILLAGE, LES AND UNION SQUARE AREA, ALL NO FEE.', 'CALL US TODAY AND WE’LL BE HAPPY TO ASSIST IN YOUR SEARCH.', 'ALSO CHECK OUT NICK’S BLOG FOR THE BEST OF EATING AND DRINKING IN THE EAST VILLAGE:', '<URL>']
